abstract: Marcel Hirscher increases his lead in World Cup standings with parallel slalom win in Stockholm.

headline.main: Hirscher Takes Command With Parallel Slalom Win

snippet: Marcel Hirscher won in Stockholm to increase his lead in the overall World Cup standings while Wendy Holdener clinched the women’s event for her first career win.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher won in Stockholm to increase his lead in the overall World Cup standings while Wendy Holdener clinched the women’s event for her first career win.
